channel.title: A lil help please?
channel.description:
Well, ive seen it done on a lot of servers and since i recently lowered price of all the high priced items, its harder to make money
However, i want pking to be good money no matter what.
So what im asking is, how do you make it so that when a player kills another player they automatically receive some cash? please tell me if you know. gonna also need where to put it. :)

item.title: A lil help please?
item.dc:creator: @slim_2021 slim_2021
item.description:
@slim_2021 wrote:

this isnt spam nub, im asking a question. if you actually read maybe youd see that[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 31, 2007, 04:26:24 AM[/size][hr]also, id like to know how you do it so that if a player kills the same person more than one time without killing someone else, they dont receive cash.

Read full topic
